title: [Medicine] Startling Case Study Finds Asymptomatic COVID-19 Carrier Who Shed Virus For 70 Days. Scientists reported the case of one woman with leukemia who had no symptoms of COVID-19 but 70 days after her first positive test, she was still shedding infectious SARS-CoV-2 particles.
[Medicine] Aspirin could be key in helping Covid-19 patients recover
